name: The Unexpected Quest (itch)
description:
Hi all!

We would like to introduce our new game. It's a casual strategy game with elements of time management.

It is a story about men and women, dwarfs and elves, orcs and undeads being forced in the face of great evil into heroism they never knew they were capable of.

At the moment, one level from the middle of the game is ready. The total time to get through this level is about one hour. We're planning a total of a ten levels, which will take anywhere from 15 minutes to one hour to complete. 

You can download a demo version of the game with one level, for Windows 64 bit.

Get more info on our Facebook page.
